cn: {"名词": ["厌恶，反感；讨厌的人（或事物）"]}
en: {"noun": ["(a person or thing that causes) a feeling of strong dislike or of not wishing to do something."]}

cn: {"动词": ["打断（其他人说话）", "短暂中止"]}
en: {"verb": ["to stop a person from speaking for a short period by something you say or do.", "to stop something from happening for a short period."]}

cn: {"名词": ["废物，垃圾"], "动词": ["丢弃", "严重破坏；拆毁", "猛烈批评，痛斥"]}

{"noun": ["moisture condensed from the atmosphere that falls visibly in separate drops."], "verb": ["rain falls."]}
{"noun": ["a cylinder of tobacco rolled in tobacco leaves for smoking."]}

cn: {"动词": ["（使）旋转", "纺线，纺纱，纺织"], "名词": ["旋转，旋动", "兜风"]}

cn: {"名词": ["混乱状态；糟糕局面"]}
en: {"noun": ["an untidy or confused state."]}

cn: {"形容词": ["不紧的，松的", "萧条的，不景气的；冷清的；懈怠的"], "名词": ["松弛，不紧", "淡季，萧条期", "煤屑", "宽松长裤，便裤"], "动词": ["使松弛，使宽松", "松懈，懈怠."]}
en: {"adjective": ["not tight; loose.", "showing a lack of activity; not busy or happening in a positive way."], "noun": ["the state of being too loose or not tight enough.", "a period when something is slower or less active than usual.", "Coal dust or small pieces of coal.", "casual trousers."], "verb": ["Loosen (something, especially a rope)", "to shirk or evade work or duty."]}

cn: {"名词": ["正相反", "对立；对照"]}
en: {"noun": ["the exact opposite.", "a contrast between two things."]}

en: {"adverb": ["by means of digital or computer technology."]}

{"noun": ["help and advice about how to do something or about how to deal with problems."]}
{"noun": ["a small, very intelligent African ape with black or brown fur."]}

en: {"adverb": ["in a manner lacking gentleness; harshly or violently.", "in a manner lacking refinement and precision.", "approximately."]}

cn: {"动词": ["缓慢且笨拙地移动", "砍下木材以供运输和销售", "负担不必要的责任或任务等情况"], "名词": ["木材或原木", "被存放的闲置物品（例如家具）"]}
en: {"verb": ["move in a slow, heavy, awkward way.", "cut and prepare forest timber for transport and sale.", "burden (someone) with an unwanted responsibility, task, or set of circumstances."], "noun": ["timber or logs especially when dressed for use.", "articles of furniture or other household items that are no longer useful and inconveniently take up storage space."]}

cn: {"动词": ["唱歌；演唱", "呜呜作响，发嗡嗡声"], "名词": ["合唱"]}
